rajawali.util

Class ArrayUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • rajawali.util.ArrayUtils

  • public class ArrayUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of methods for working with primitive arrays.
    Author:
    Jared Woolston (jwoolston@tenkiv.com)

      • convertDoublesToFloats

        public static float[] convertDoublesToFloats(double[] input,
                             float[] output)
        Converts an array of doubles to an array of floats, using the provided output array.
        Parameters:
        input - double[] array to be converted.
        output - float[] array to store the result in.
        Returns:
        float[] a reference to output. Returned for convenience.

      • convertDoublesToFloats

        public static float[] convertDoublesToFloats(double[] input)
        Converts an array of doubles to an array of floats, allocating a new array.
        Parameters:
        input - double[] array to be converted.
        Returns:
        float[] array with the result. Will be null if input was null.

      • convertFloatsToDoubles

        Converts an array of floats to an array of doubles, using the provided output array.
        Parameters:

        output - double[] array to store the result in.
        Returns:
        float[] a reference to output. Returned for convenience.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        float[] array with the result. Will be null if input was null.

        Returns:

      • getIntArrayFromBuffer

        public static int[] getIntArrayFromBuffer(java.nio.Buffer buffer)
        Creates an int array from the provided IntBuffer or ShortBuffer.
        Parameters:
        buffer - Buffer the data source. Should be either a IntBuffer or ShortBuffer.
        Returns:
        int array containing the data of the buffer.
